findings.title: Owner can change tax and liquidity fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify tax and liquidity fees.

findings.title: Owner can change maximum transaction amount
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the maximum transaction amount.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from the fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude certain addresses or users from paying fees.

findings.title: Owner can change minimum tokens before swap
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the minimum tokens required before a swap operation.

findings.title: Owner can change marketing and XRP charity wallets
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify marketing and XRP charity wallets without restrictions.

findings.title: Owner can disable and enable swapAndLiquifyByLimitOnly
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to disable and enable swapAndLiquifyByLimitOnly, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner Privileges: Enable prepareForPreSale and prepareForLaunch Presets
findings.description: The owner has the ability to enable prepareForPreSale and prepareForLaunch presets, which can lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can change Uniswap router address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the Uniswap router address.

findings.title: Owner can change fees
findings.description: The owner has privileges to modify fees.

findings.title: Owner can lock and unlock
findings.description: The owner has the capability to lock and unlock, which allows them to retake privileges even after ownership renouncement.
